channel.title: rvv-bench - Articles
channel.description: Articles about RISC-V optimizations with focus on vectorization. I kind of treat this as a personal blog.

item.title: RISC-V Vector Extension for Integer Workloads: An Informal Gap Analysis
item.description: Something slightly different today, this is an "informal" gap analysis of RVV for integer workloads. I've been working on this for quite some time now, please provide opinions and feedback.

item.title: SWAR UTF-8 Validation with the hidden RISC-V gem xperm4
item.description: I recently stubled on the very versatile xperm4 an xperm8 instructions, and I'll show how they can be used to implement SWAR UTF-8 validation.

item.title: Vectorizing Unicode conversions on real RISC-V hardware
item.description: This article discusses how to vectorize UTF-8 to UTF-16 conversion, using the RISC-V Vector extension. We archive substation speedups on real hardware: 8x for C908/X60, and 11x for C920.
